title: Mia Chloe
author: Mia Chloe
content: After my first Bitcoin poem on this forum I decided to compose another poem  this is a little similar to my previous poem but I think it's worth readingHere is a link to my first poem https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5458134.0Born to the internet an amazing "GOLD"Satoshi's creation a currency of worth.With cryptographic might it protects every movewith Anonymity and security as its ideology Blockchain ledgers a chain symphony oh block chain ledgers lacking falsities oh block chain miners guardians of computationvalidating each transaction with cryptographic mightOh Bitcoin a Gold of Infinite supply and  yet finite in its scopeA wonderful digital asset Defying normsChallenging investors with it's wonders and uniqueness in the "cryptographic verse"Oh Bitcoin a dream catalyst if used wiselyThe future economic force for all to baskAn asset of financial freedom for  all who seekUnleashing cryptographic power for all to hodlyet over the glory  caution wispersFor scams and hackers lurk in disguiseSecurity is the key to resist Oh ye hodlersBitcoin a fortune with grand promisesThe future of transactions across the land.A gold to the digital era where it standsOh Bitcoin wonderful and "nice"Thanks for reading through you can drop your thoughts here and give a possible topic for my next poem

It has a finite supply, not infinite.Bitcoin controlled supplyLearning about Bitcoin and please don't make poems with not correct information.QuoteThanks for reading through you can drop your thoughts here and give a possible topic for my next poem Hope that you will not make other poems.My poem; Bitcoin oh ye wonderful.
